channel.title: L M on Tools for Academic Research
channel.description: Recent content in L M on Tools for Academic Research

item.title: PPResume
item.description: A LaTeX Based Resume Builder that helps people create beautifully typed resumes in minutes

item.title: FocusTube
item.description: Find Best Work & Study BGM ðŸŽ§ Welcome to FocusTube - the go-to platform for sharing YouTube videos perfect for focused activities. Discover a diverse range of genres, including lo-fi hip hop, electronica, jazz, and ambient sounds such as cafe noise or rain sounds. Anyone can submit their favorites, making our collection constantly growing and ever-changing.

item.title: myNoise
item.description: Discover a world of immersive and customizable soundscapes that can enhance focus, relaxation, and sleep. Choose from noise generators, nature sounds and ambient music to create your perfect audio environment. Explore our vast library of interactive sound generators and find your audio haven!

item.title: Perplexity AI
item.description: Perplexity is your AI-powered Swiss Army Knife for information discovery and curiosity. It’s not just about answering questions; it’s about empowering you to do moreâ€”whether you’re looking to summarize content, explore new topics, or even get a little creative.

item.title: Typst
item.description: Typst is a new markup-based typesetting system for the sciences. It is designed to be an alternative both to advanced tools like LaTeX and simpler tools like Word and Google Docs. Our goal with Typst is to build a typesetting tool that is highly capable and a pleasure to use.

item.title: Inciteful
item.description: Find the most relevant literature using graphs and metrics.

item.title: Playground AI
item.description: Generate images for your presentations

item.title: Adobe Firefly
item.description: Experiment, imagine, and create an infinite range of images with Firefly, generative AI-powered content creation from Adobe.

item.title: Microsoft Bing Image Generator
item.description: Generate images by typing some texts.

item.title: Replicate
item.description: Run and share models in the cloud at scale.

item.title: Sciencecast
item.description: ScienceCast is a free open-access platform for researchers to disseminate their scientific results and ideas to a wide audience of fellow scientists, journal Editors, grant program managers, and other professionals working at the cutting edge of science and innovation.

item.title: Influence Map
item.description: Influence flower visualizes citation influences among academic entities, including papers, authors, institutions, and research topics.

item.title: Scholarcy
item.description: The AI-powered article summarizer

item.title: QuillBot
item.description: Toolbox for academic reading and writing

item.title: SciSpace
item.description: Search the largest scientific corpus in the world. Discover and study research papers better with SciSpace copilot

item.title: Prompt Engineering Guide
item.description: Guides on prompt engineering to get the best out of the Large Language Models.

item.title: A.R.I.A. (Aria)
item.description: Aria is Your AI Research Assistant Powered by Large Language Models

item.title: ChatGPT
item.description: A model called ChatGPT which interacts in a conversational way. The dialogue format makes it possible for ChatGPT to answer follow-up questions, admit its mistakes, challenge incorrect premises, and reject inappropriate requests.

item.title: dimensions.ai
item.description: With Dimensions, you have free access to a vast collection of curated research outputs and tools that help you source exactly what you need to advance your own discoveries.

item.title: Curvenote
item.description: A beautiful writing tool designed for technical writing, connected to Jupyter.

item.title: PaperDigest
item.description: Sci-Tech knowledge graph & text analysis platform for scientific literature tracking, summarization and search

item.title: Papers with Code
item.description: The mission of Papers with Code is to create a free and open resource with Machine Learning papers, code, datasets, methods and evaluation tables. There is also papers with code for physics, astronomy, and more.

item.title: Dendron
item.description: Opensource knowledge management inside your vscode editor, with linked notes, and tools for publishing notes.

item.title: Logseq
item.description: Logseq is a joyful, open-source outliner that works on top of local plain-text Markdown and Org-mode files. Use it to write, organize and share your thoughts, keep your to-do list, and build your own digital garden.

item.title: Elicit
item.description: Elicit is a GPT-3 powered research assistant.

item.title: Kroki
item.description: Creates diagrams from textual descriptions

item.title: ReadPaper
item.description: A Chinese website for reading, managing, and discussing research papers online.

item.title: PaperPanda
item.description: PaperPanda is a chrome extension to access the PDF files of research papers by automatically searching the web. So our research is not blocked by the paywall.

item.title: papers-with-video
item.description: A browser extension that adds video explanations to research papers on arxiv.org

item.title: PubPeer
item.description: The online journal club of research articles with comments.

item.title: Colorgorical
item.description: A categorical color generator for data visualizations. It takes into account of perceptual distance.

item.title: ColorHunt
item.description: Color palletes with a clean UI

item.title: LaptopFriendly
item.description: Find a laptop friendly place to work

item.title: Bibcitation
item.description: Cite your sources in over 9,000 formats and generate automatic citations and works cited for books, websites and journal articles.

item.title: gatsby-digital-garden
item.description: A set of packages to create a digital garden with Gatsby.

item.title: Artigopapers
item.description: Explore scientific, technical, and medical research on Artigo

item.title: Gatsby knowledge base theme
item.description: Create your Second Brain by writing down your thoughts - or as the term used this theme topics - and their relations in markdown.

item.title: slidev
item.description: Presentation Slides for Developers

item.title: Deckset
item.description: Deckset designs your slides, so you can focus on your ideas

item.title: Fusuma
item.description: A tool to create slides easily for you, using markdown with interactions (mdx).

item.title: Data Stewardship Wizard
item.description: Create Smart Data Management Plans for FAIR Open Science

item.title: Dataverse
item.description: Open source research data repository software that can be setup easily

item.title: Litmaps
item.description: Navigate the literature with interactive visualisations of citation networks and discover science faster

item.title: Sighchology Research Lab | æ˜Ÿç¤¼ç ”ç©¶æ‰€
item.description: In this game, you play as a student in the Sighchology Research Lab. In this dark place, you do research every night and day without sleep, because you have been given a great mission: to publish a piece of paper.

item.title: Principia: Master of Science
item.description: Principia: Master of Science is a simulation game with the theme of European science in 17th century. Choose one of 12 real scientists from the era of Isaac Newton and proceed with your research. It is a time when even the term “Science” did not exist. Who can be the master of science?

item.title: FOAM
item.description: A personal knowledge management and sharing system for VSCode

item.title: SciWheel
item.description: Reference Manager to discover, read, annotate, write and share scientific research

item.title: Table Convert Online
item.description: Web-based tool to converts Excel, URL, HTML, Markdown table and CSV to Markdown table, CSV/TSV, JSON, XML, YAML, insert SQL, HTML, Excel and LaTeX table.

item.title: SciNote
item.description: SciNote Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN). Top-rated solution trusted by the FDA & 70k+ scientists in 100+ countries.

item.title: RSpace
item.description: The next-gen eLab notebook with free data storage and free version.

item.title: Labstep
item.description: Unify your scientific data documentation through Labstep’s all-in-one cloud solution. Connect your notebook, inventory, data collection and downstream analysis. Share your records in a secure environment.

item.title: Labii
item.description: User-friendly, fully customizable Electronic Lab Notebook and Laboratory Information Management System

item.title: The Electronic Lab Notebook in 2020: A comprehensive guide
item.description: How to choose the best ELN for your research?

item.title: Labguru
item.description: Run your lab more efficiently and maximize your research output. Plan and document experiments, track progress, streamline lab logistics, and share results.

item.title: Labfolder
item.description: A reliable infrastructure for your data

item.title: Labcollector
item.description: All-in-One Lab notebook and management platform.

item.title: Labarchives
item.description: The Leading Research Data Management Platform.

item.title: Hivebench
item.description: Everything you need to do research: Plan, Experiment, Publish.

item.title: eLabFTW
item.description: A free and open source electronic lab notebook designed by researchers, for researchers, with usability in mind.

item.title: Benchling
item.description: Electronic Lab Notebook done right. Bringing life to life science R&D by transforming your R&D with the industry’s most widely adopted Life Sciences R&D Cloud.

item.title: Endnote Click
item.description: A browser extension to read and download papers for free and legally.

item.title: Peeriodicals
item.description: Create and Edit your own journal

item.title: Deepnote
item.description: Data science notebooks for teams

item.title: Open Textbooks
item.description: Free, adaptable, openly licensed textbooks and supplemental resources.

item.title: Open Scholarship Knowledge Base
item.description: Discover open scholarship resources created and curated by the community.

item.title: Bifrost AI Datasets
item.description: Search for visual datasets by task, application, class, label or format

item.title: WizdomAI
item.description: Understand the journals and institutes through publications

item.title: nomnoml
item.description: a tool for drawing UML diagrams based on a simple syntax.

item.title: Conference Partner
item.description: The Latest Information Technology Conference and Journal List

item.title: ConferenceList
item.description: List of conferences in ML/AI

item.title: Writing Science
item.description: As a scientist, you are a professional writer: your career is built on successful proposals and papers. Success isn’t defined by getting papers into print, but by getting them into the reader’s consciousness. Writing Science is built upon the idea that successful science writing tells a story. It uses that insight to discuss how to write more effectively.

item.title: Academic Phrasebank
item.description: The Academic Phrasebank is a general resource for academic writers. It aims to provide you with examples of some of the phraseological â€˜nuts and boltsâ€™ of writing organised according to the main sections of a research paper or dissertation.

item.title: Scolary
item.description: Find the best scientific tools for literally any stage of your research on Scolary.

item.title: AcademicLabs
item.description: Platform where you find research groups with their current research focus, publications, patents, clinical trials and projects. Research groups can also connect with industry easily here.

item.title: Tectonic Typesetting System
item.description: Tectonic is a modernized, complete, self-contained TeX/LaTeX engine, powered by XeTeX and TeXLive. Tectonic makes LaTeX easy to compile.

item.title: Mind the Graph
item.description: Create beautiful scientific infographics with no effort

item.title: Antidote
item.description: Writing assistant with grammar, typography and style check, dictionaries, and writing guides.

item.title: Connected Papers
item.description: Explore connected papers in a visual graph

item.title: ScholarshipDB
item.description: scholarshipdb.net is a scholarship and research job search engine. The search engine employs state of the art technologies to collect latest information from various sources and present them to you in a single website.

item.title: Supernotes
item.description: card based note-taking with links between cards

item.title: Responsible Journals
item.description: Understand how the journals deal with submissions and how reviews are done

item.title: RAx - Your Personal Smart Research Assistant (Rebranded to Enago Read)
item.description: (Rebranded to Enago Read) Speed up literature analysis and comprehension with RAx. Smart assistant to explore, collate insights and organize your research easily.

item.title: Obsidian
item.description: note-taking with zettelkasten method (linked notes)

item.title: RoamResearch
item.description: Online note-taking with zettelkasten method (connected notes)

item.title: Notion
item.description: Write, plan, collaborate, and get organized â€” all in one tool. Write connected notes with rich format and Export to markdown, pdf, etc.

item.title: MarginNote
item.description: Efficient and visual note-taking and knowledge management while reading

item.title: Calendly
item.description: Calendly helps you schedule meetings without the back-and-forth emails

item.title: Doodle
item.description: It shouldnâ€™t take 30 emails to schedule a 30-minute meeting. Book meetings faster with the smart scheduling power of Doodle

item.title: SciTools
item.description: Open tools for the analysis and visualisation of Earth science data

item.title: AMiner
item.description: AI Powered Research Career: rankings of researchers, academic institutes, and conferences; trends of research topics; datasets for research.

item.title: Academic Positions
item.description: All kinds of academic jobs listings.

item.title: European Funding Guide
item.description: Find money for your education in Europe.

item.title: Bashplotlib
item.description: plotting in the terminal using plaintext
